name: Ethereum
creator: Vitalik Buterin

whitepaper.title: Ethereum: A Next-Generation Smart Contract and Decentralized Application Platform

description: Ethereum is a decentralized platform that enables the creation of smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps).
problem_solved: Limited programmability of blockchain technology, enabling complex decentralized applications
consensus_mechanism: Proof of Stake (previously Proof of Work)

milestones.details: Vitalik Buterin publishes the Ethereum whitepaper
Ethereum launches its initial coin offering (ICO), raising over $18 million
Ethereum Frontier, the first public release of Ethereum, goes live
The DAO smart contract is exploited, leading to the Ethereum Classic fork
Ethereum transitions from Proof of Work to Proof of Stake consensus
